title: Notwithstanding anything contained in this Regulation, where the existing Market/designated land is having combination of user/reservation, the existing BUA of such user shall be necessarily put to such use
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in this Regulation, where the existing Market/designated land is having combination of user/reservation, the existing BUA of such user shall be necessarily put to such use. No premium shall be charged for Fungible compensatory area as per Regulation No 31(3).
section: 33(21) Development and Redevelopment of Municipal Market/Public Amenities by MCGM/Government
